ygData.messageBody:
Name: Jai Sacks
Age: 25
Location: Fort Worth, TX. (Hi Jason!)
Gender: rock solid man!
Home Page: not anymore - too much effort
Status: In a wonderful relationship with the best man in the world!
Main Character: Hamyrmint - 10th Level Dwarven Cleric - SolusekRo
Other character: Alindil - 16th level WoodElf Druid - SolusekRo
Most hated EQ Monster: so far - The named griffon in Nkarana - claw something - bastard has a habit of spawning next to me when I am fighting something else..
Favorite Eq Monster: - I watched a friend fight a dragon in Veeshan's peak one night - THAT WAS COOL!!
FAV TV show: Buffy - hands down -the best show on TV right now
Fav Author: classic: Shakespeare modern: Terry Moore, Neil Gaiman, Warren Ellis, Grant Morrisson
Non-eq hobbies: oh god.. Movies, games, I am such a geek - I collect comics, action figures, GunDam models, Japanese anime, I am a writer. LOL - I am such a geek - it'd be horrid if I wasn't so cute! :)
A few words that describe me: I dunno. I work for a local university as a computer technician. I have a great boyfriend and wonderful friends and family. Can't really complain too much.. OH - and my cat is planning to take over the world - just a warning!

Jai


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
